thread.section_title: Ashburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good
thread.title_full: Very good - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PB57
title: Very good
text:
Conveniently located; well kept, comfortable rooms; and, friendly, efficient staff. We have visited London on several occasions and we liked that this hotel is in the museum area and is surrounded by several comfortable pubs and eateries, although I suggest you avoid the Vecchiomondo restaurant over the road from the hotel, see separate review.
After a comfortable night we had breakfast in the hotel and found the complimentary continental breakfast to be filling enough without needing the fully cooked breakfast.
We would stay in the hotel again and recommend it.
